title: If the CSS is forming a part of a building, it shall comply with all the safety precautions insisted upon by the concerned Electricity Distribution Company and the requirements of Chief Fire Officer
clause_text: If the CSS is forming a part of a building, it shall comply with all the safety precautions insisted upon by the concerned Electricity Distribution Company and the requirements of Chief Fire Officer.
